BRUCIE3.original: ~s~Go to the internet cafe.
~s~When ready, stand up and take out a weapon. Press ~PAD_LT~ to get up.
BRUCIE3.translated: ~s~准备好后就起身掏出武器。按~PAD_LT~起身。

BRUCIE3.original: ~r~You failed to lure French Tom out of hiding.
~s~Reply positively to French Tom's email to confirm the date.
BRUCIE3.translated: ~s~积极回复French Tom的邮件以确认约会。

BRUCIE3.original: ~s~You have sent a date request to French Tom. Log off.
BRUCIE3.translated: ~s~你已向French Tom发送了约会请求。注销。

BRUCIE3.original: ~s~Allow some time for French Tom to check Lovemeet and email you his reply.
BRUCIE3.translated: ~s~耐心等待French Tom上觅爱网看见消息后回复你的邮件。

BRUCIE3.original: ~s~Click on the LOVEMEET link.
~r~You missed your date with French Tom.
~s~French Tom hasn't arrived. Wait in the diner.
~s~You have refused a date with French Tom. Log off.
BRUCIE3.translated: ~s~你拒绝了和French Tom的约会。注销。

BRUCIE3.original: ~s~Click on the WEB icon.
~s~Lose your wanted level before meeting French Tom.
BRUCIE3.translated: ~s~在和French Tom约会之前，摆脱通缉。

BRUCIE3.original: ~r~You abandoned the date.
~s~Find French Tom and click the MORE button underneath his picture to view his profile.
BRUCIE3.translated: ~s~找到French Tom，点击他照片下方的「更多」以浏览他的资料。

BRUCIE3.original: ~r~French Tom got away.
~s~Go back to the diner and meet French Tom.
~s~French Tom is registered in the male section. Click on the MALE button.
BRUCIE3.translated: ~s~French Tom注册的资料是男性。点击「MALE」。

BRUCIE3.original: ~s~To arrange a meeting, scroll to the bottom of the page and click on the DATE button.
BRUCIE3.translated: ~s~要安排约会，滚动到页面底部，点击「约会」。

BRUCIE3.original: ~s~Go to the diner and meet French Tom.
~s~Use ~INPUT_MOUSE_WHEEL_UP~ and ~INPUT_MOUSE_WHEEL_DOWN~ to scroll.
~s~Get back on the computer and check Lovemeet for FRENCH TOM.
BRUCIE3.translated: ~s~重新登录电脑，在觅爱网寻找FRENCH TOM。

BRUCIE3.original: ~s~Use ~PAD_RSTICK_UP~ and ~PAD_RSTICK_DOWN~ to scroll.
~s~You have a new email. Check your inbox.
BRUCIE3.translated: ~s~你收到了新邮件，检查你的收件箱。

BRUCIE3.original: ~s~French Tom is inside the diner. Look for him.
~s~Lose your wanted level.
~s~Take down ~r~French Tom.
~s~When ready, stand up and take out a weapon. Press ~INPUT_PICKUP~ to get up.
BRUCIE3.translated: ~s~准备好后就起身掏出武器。按~INPUT_PICKUP~起身。

BRUCIE3.original: ~s~Use a computer to get on love-meet.net and find FRENCH TOM.
BRUCIE3.translated: ~s~用电脑登录觅爱网，寻找FRENCH TOM。
